The Cliqz Ad Blocker is in beta at the moment. The final version will provide the following options: Allow Fair Ads (default setting), Block All Ads, Allow All Ads. More https://cliqz.com/whycliqz/adblocking View video offline Overview Open Tabs Favorites Warning: deceptive website! Cliqz has blocked access to %1$s because it has been reported as a phishing website. Phishing websites disguise as other sites you may trust in order to trick you into disclosing your login, password or other sensitive information. [Learn more|https://cliqz.com/en/whycliqz/anti-phishing] Back to safe site Continue despite warning Your data is protected Your data is not protected Private data points have been removed Anti-Tracking is turned off for this website Tracking companies Private data points Others Download Started Added to favorites Exit View Tab created Most visited sites and news Got it Customize the protection of your data to your needs.

Search results for Germany France United States Report Website Clear passwords Would you like to clear saved passwords? Open Cliqz Browser on your computer (or get it from cliqz.com). Connect Cliqz on your mobile device with Cliqz on your computer. This will allow you to send tabs between your desktop and your mobile device. You can also directly download videos from your desktop browser to your mobile device. Sorry, but the devices could not be connected. Please try again. Connection failed Retry Connection successful You connected your first device! Now you are ready to send tabs between your desktop and your mobile device. You can also directly download videos from your desktop browser to your mobile device. Forget Tab You are browsing in Forget Mode: websites you visit in this mode will not be saved in your history, and local data, including cookies, will not be stored. Cliqz Tab %d item selected %d items selected Privacy Policy https://cliqz.com/en/privacy-browser EULA The Cliqz for Android browser is built upon the Lightning Browser open source project and is made available to you under the terms of the Mozilla Public License 2.0 a free software license, which gives you the right to run the program for any purpose, to study how it works, to give copies to your friends and to modify it to meet your needs better. There is no separate End User License Agreement (EULA). EULA %d topsite deleted %d topsites deleted Welcome to Cliqz!
